original: 荊州襄陽人，劉備屬下。在荊襄一帶頗負盛名，略亞於鳳雛龐統，與馬良齊名。但不知為何似乎未得重用，史書上記載也不多。
text: Xiangyang, Jingzhou, under Liu Bei. It is quite famous in the Jingxiang area, slightly inferior to Fengchu Pangtong, and equal to Ma Liang. But for some reason it seems to have not been reused, and there are not many records in history books.
